name: Elitrof Whitemane

other_aspects: 'Ole Great Bear' of the Skaal of Solstheim

trouble: Insult to your honor, your shield-siblings, Kodlak, or Skyrim's ways flips your restraint switch OFF.
You refuse to tolerate disrespect toward Skyrim's culture, history, or the Old Ways.
Any hint of the Talos ban being enforced in your presence becomes a line in the snow.
If pushed, you default to settling it the Old Way: a duel (sometimes to the death).
Slights against the Skaal are treated as personal affronts, no matter who delivers them.

Warrior-Poet of Jorvaskr: You can't resist turning a tense moment into a public verse or challenge, raising stakes and attention.
A chance to do something legendary is dangled in front of you, even if it's tactically unwise.
You are expected to represent Jorrvaskr with honor, and you can't walk away when it's questioned.
Nomadic Sage of Skyrim: A rumor of an ancient site, lost saga, or half-true legend drags you off the direct path.
You stop to record or verify a detail that 'has to be right,' costing precious time.
You feel responsible for correcting ignorance, even when silence would be safer.
Adoptive Son of Kodlak Whitemane: Kodlak's expectations (or the Companions' needs) override your personal plans.
Someone speaks ill of Kodlak or the Companions, and you take it as a personal summons.
You protect the Harbinger's reputation, even if it means swallowing pride or taking blame.
'Ole Great Bear' of the Skaal of Solsthe: Your 'oversized bear' cloak draws questions you'd rather not answer, forcing a lie or a confrontation.
Skaal trouble reaches you by rumor; you feel obligated to answer the call.
You refuse to let outsiders mock or exploit Skaal customs, even if it complicates alliances.

compel_library.notes: Use these as GM compels and pressure points. Tie them to public scenes, honor challenges, Talos enforcement, and Skaal-related prejudice.

stunts: Skyforge Mastery: +2 to Fight when dual-wielding Skyforge steel weapons
Saga-Maker: Once per scene, invoke a personal aspect for free when performing a legendary act in public
Old Way Challenge: Declare a duel; target must accept or suffer a social consequence
equipment: Skyforge Steel Waraxe (Jorrvaskr) x2 [one etched with Ysgramor, one etched with a dragon]
notes: Elitrof is a crimson-maned Nord warrior-poet of Jorrvaskr. He dual-wields Skyforge steel waraxes, one etched with Ysgramor and one with a dragon. He wears a werebear-hide cloak and an Amulet of Talos, and carries the Lord Stone's blessing.
